data.message: Ayo Em please hear me out ? A yo all I Got is this mic n I hope I don't choke I'm constantly looking for a job cuz I'm always broke ima joke there's  no hope for me but hopefully my lyrics are as dope as u see iv lost everything I love n just like u it's all b cuz of a stupid drug I ain't a thug I ain't a gangsta I'm just a no name artist trying to become a famous painter my x girl is the cause of my anger she broke my heart so now my souls gone lost in the dark so much smoke I can't see all eyes on me but my visions cloudy n I'm proud to be a loud MC cuz without people like u there wouldn't  be a kid like me I sit down n listen to the angels call I freak out n whip my note book at the fuking wall cuz it feels like I only raise to fall but Until I dye I won't fail until that hammer hits the nail of my coffin even on my death bed I won't soften smoke the blunt till I stop coughing it's not often your tossed in a switch-tion evolving Eminem I know  I'm not the greatest I'm just like them n  u sipping my brew steady repping  my crew n if people actually really knew what the fuk we've been through they wouldn't  judge us as fools n goons they call us worthless but every MC has a sound wit a purpose every snake swims wit the serpents every stage must close the curtains every line n word must be perfect shit  even some crime is worth it  pumping iron bars watch me work it murder the beat watch me murk it I feel it wen I revel it burn words hot like a skillet my skill I killed it then shocked it back to life I write wit a knife duck taped to my mic my life's like a 12 round fight with mike Tyson my heads always down trying to hide from my sin eyes open wide when I'm grinding ima diamond so u look in the dirt to find him here my papers who wanna sigh them ?

replies.message: Damn bruh,dis shit dope!thumbs up..am an mc n i knw dis could get stole d way u put it on here.
lil wayne will steal this props on the freestyle.
Lil Wayne has a ghost writer to write for him, lol, no worries.
